casebody.data:
ZALIAGIRIS
v.
ZALIAGIRIS. No. 332A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Preston O. Odom, III, Charlotte, for Elizabeth Smith Zaliagiris. Tate Sterrett, Kary C. Watson, Charlotte, for Thomas E. Zaliagiris.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of November 2005 by Plaintiff to Strike Defendant Appellee's New Brief and to preclude any presentation from Defendant Appellee at oral argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
